0: Count your life by smiles, not tears. Count your age by friends, not years. Happy birthday!

3: There are friends and then there are best friends, happy birthday to the best friend I could have asked for!

7: I thought you get finer and wiser with age? Well, there��s always next year!
8: You're older today than yesterday but younger than tomorrow, happy birthday!

10: Woah, time flies when you're having fun! How'd we get so old?
